file_content.text: This is my third request that's been ignored. You've left the entire compound exposed to attack!
We're at war for your crown. I haven't got time to see to your personal entourage.
The impudence! Where does the Empire get its soldiers these days? Some swamp on Hutta?
Maybe you'd like it if we pulled out altogether. See how House Thul fares on its own.
Let me worry about the men, my lord. Go back to the dining hall where you belong.
